ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: How do you feel?
ygData.msgSnippet: Monks with good gear can do that stuff.  My gear is only average. Quwi ... __________________________________ Do you Yahoo!? SBC Yahoo! DSL - Now only $29.95
ygData.messageBody:
Monks with good gear can do that stuff. My gear is
only average.

Quwi
--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> Well, there is a lvl 52 monk named Technoe who has
> soloed Nagafen and Vox.
> There is a video of him soloing Nagafen to the tune
> of "My Balls, Your
> Chin". It's on a website somewhere. If anyone wants
> to see it I can find the
> url again.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > I personally was bummed when they made it
> impossible
> > to solo monks any more. I haven't been feeling
> the
> > urge to log in much since they did that, so I was
> one
> > of the ones who voted to let people solo, even
> with a
> > penality... I'd enjoy it more than begging for
> groups
> > in the planes.
> >
> > I've been in the game since 4/1/99 so I think I
> can
> > say with certainty that its a million times easier
> > than it used to be. Many more zones, much less
> > crowding, tons of more items, features like the
> Bazaar
> > and being able to move around without a drood's
> help,
> > etc. Its a better game now.
> >
> > But I'd give it all back to not have to beg for
> > groups. Sitting and spinning on my arse while I
> wait
> > for a group desperate enough to take a monk is a
> > bummer, and not fun in my view. Figuring out a
> > stratagy to solo certain spots was great fun for
> me,
> > as well as the competition with other solo's for
> the
> > good spots.
> >
> > I didn't care so much about the monk nerf power
> wise
> > except that it came at a time when we were being
> > forced to group past 60... double whammy that
> makes it
> > hard to get in a group.
> >
> > Quwi Changkane, Fenin Ro Grandmaster
> >
> >
>
>
